abstract: The prosecutors’ office in Krakow says a request by the United States for the extradition of the director Roman Polanski can proceed.
snippet: The prosecutors’ office in Krakow says a request by the United States for the extradition of the director Roman Polanski can proceed.

headline.main: Prosecutors in Poland Send Polanski Extradition Request to Court
headline.print_headline: Extradition Request For Polanski Is in Court
